column4: Is anyone using the compiz packages from compiz.net on dapper?
i'm using a non-standard repo, but don't know if it is pulled from there
I'm having trouble getting compiz to use the settings in gconf. For instance the number of viewports. are you having any trouble like that?
no, but iirc there was something i had to do to update gconf a while back
unfortunately, i'm not using gui just now so can't check
ok. if you get a chance, please let me know.
i'll see what i can find out. In the meantime, you could try the repo i'm using??
ok. thats the mirror for the compiz.net packages. same ones I have. :)
:) - There certainly was something i had to do (maybe it was to install a "gconf" module in compiz??)
wow... that might be it. It's installed, but not loaded.
very excellent. I was missing a lot of functionality.
now you'll have to put up with your keybindings being messed up by the developers every couple of days when they release a new version....
